name: NYC Icarus
body:
### Welcome to NYC Icarus

This is NYC Icarus central.  Our local community supports both organizing and peer-support.

Please sign up for our low-traffic, announcement only mailing list:

[https://lists.riseup.net/www/subscribe/icarusnyc-events](https://lists.riseup.net/www/subscribe/icarusnyc-events)

The riseup list software is very, err, protective. You may need to visit https://lists.riseup.net/ and then search for 'nycicarus' to find the link to subscribe to "NYC Icarus announcements list".  Sometimes the direct link fails.

You can also request to join our NYC organizers mailing list:

[https://lists.riseup.net/www/admin/nycicarus-organizers](https://lists.riseup.net/www/admin/nycicarus-organizers)

This is our Facebook Group (although we try to minimize the organizing and conversations that happen there):

[https://www.facebook.com/IcarusProjectNewYorkCity](https://www.facebook.com/IcarusProjectNewYorkCity)

Follow us on twitter: @[nycicarus](twitter.com/nycicarus)

You can contact nycicarus at gmail dot com if you have any questions.

Mad Love!

♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ ♥ ∞ 

### Local Peer-Support groups

There are currently no public, open Icarus peer-support groups happening in New York City.

Instead, we are experimenting with this model of an open network of closed groups: 

[(A small group of) friends make the best medicine](http://theicarusproject.net/alternative-treatments/a-small-group-friends-make-best-medicine)

Periodically, we host meetups to help people organize new cells. Please contact nycicarus at gmail dot com if you are interested in joining or starting a cell.

### News and Announcements 

Coming soon!
